description: This is a shell script that automates the build, configuration, and installation of the AppGateway plugin for the app-gateway2 project, specifically utilizing Thunder 4.4 SDK. It sets up environment variables, checks for necessary files and directories, configures CMake, performs the build, and manages installation and symlinks.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs informational messages with a specific prefix.

methods.name: die
methods.description: Logs an error message and exits the script.
